a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: People living in countries in which same-sex sexual acts are legal,
Law that sexual acts between consenting same-sex adults in private are not criminalized. Some countries only criminalize
Data source: Mignot (2022); Population based on various sources (2023)
Note: Countries are considered even before they were independent.
